sentence.text: In this study, we identified prolyl-tRNA aminoacylation as upregulated in estrogen receptor positive (ER+) human breast tumors in the TCGA and METABRIC cohorts, with copy number gains in nearly 50% of samples in both datasets.
prolyl-tRNA aminoacylation expression is associated with reduced overall survival in patients with ER+ tumors in TCGA and METABRIC datasets.
We demonstrated the necessity of prolyl-tRNA aminoacylation for proliferation of tamoxifen-resistant ER+ breast cancer, but not ER- breast cancer cells.
